VII.i.1.B.5.b
.
Correct Address of the Intended Recipient of the Form Is Unknown
Follow the steps in the table below if
a
VA Form 21P-0537
or
VA Form 21-0538
is returned to VA as undeliverable because the address is incorrect, and
the correct address of the intended recipient is
unknown
.
Step
Action
1
Is the form a
VA Form 21-0538
that VA received as undeliverable mail on or after September 19, 2020?
If
yes
,
cancel the EP 330 referenced in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.B.2.a
, and
go to the next step.
If
no
, go to the next step.
2
Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.C.6.d
, and, if so directed,
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.C.6.g and i
.  If a new address is obtained at any point in the procedures described in these blocks
disregard the remaining instructions in those blocks, and
follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.B.5.a
,
starting with Step 2
.
